SEARCH
Module help
Package help.utilities

Class UserDBO

java.lang.Object
help.utilities.UserDBO
public class UserDBO extends Object
Data Base Object (DBO) class for managing User-related database operations.

  • Constructor Details

    • UserDBO

      public UserDBO()

  • Method Details

    • getUser

      public User getUser(String username)
      Retrieves a user from the database by their username.

      This method queries the database for a user with the specified username. If the user is found, a `User` object is created and populated with the user's details from the database.

      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The `User` object corresponding to the specified username, or `null` if no user is found.

    • getUserIdByUsername

      public int getUserIdByUsername(String username)
      Retrieves the user ID from the database by the specified username.

      This method queries the database for the user ID associated with the given username. If a matching user is found, the user ID is returned. Otherwise, it returns -1 to indicate that no user with the specified username was found.

      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user whose ID is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The user ID of the specified username, or -1 if the user is not found.

    • getAllUsers

      public List<User> getAllUsers()
      Retrieves all users from the database.

      This method executes a query to retrieve all users from the database, including their first name, last name, username, role, password, and user ID. The results are returned as a list of User objects.

      Returns:
      A list of User objects representing all users in the database.

    • insertUser

      public boolean insertUser(User user, String password)
      Inserts a new user into the database.

      This method inserts a new user into the database with the provided first name, last name, username, password, and role. The password will be stored as provided, so it should be hashed before calling this method.

      Parameters:
      user - The User object containing the user details.
      password - The plain-text password for the user.
      Returns:
      true if the user was successfully inserted into the database, false otherwise.

    • updateUser

      public boolean updateUser(User user, String oldString)
      Updates the details of an existing user in the database.

      This method updates the first name, last name, username, password, and role of a user in the database based on the provided User object. The user is identified by their current username, and their user ID is fetched before updating the user details. If the username has changed, the oldString parameter is used to handle the username change.

      Parameters:
      user - The User object containing the updated user details.
      oldString - The old username (if the username is being changed), or an empty string if the username is not changed.
      Returns:
      true if the user details were successfully updated, false otherwise.

    • deleteUser

      public boolean deleteUser(String username)
      Deletes a user from the database.

      This method deletes a user identified by their username from the database. It performs the deletion by executing the DELETE SQL statement.

      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user to be deleted.
      Returns:
      true if the user was successfully deleted, false otherwise.
